Articles.Content: Does anyone know the altitude of the highest point/mountain/peak/hill/areallyhighplace on the Mun is so I can get the lowest, safest orbit possible? It just means one less dead trio of kerbals. If I go lower than that otherwise I risk hitting something and Jeb would not be happy. Thanks 8)
Past discussions have concluded that you will be safe at 4 kilometers, potentially even less.
4 km? Sweet. and sorry if this is a sort of noob question by the way ???

4 km? Sweet. and sorry if this is a sort of noob question by the way ???

If you are orbiting at the equator you can go like 3kmish.
I\'ve had stable orbits near 2km, perfectly equatorial. I was looking for Munoliths.
I once hit a mountain at c. 2300, so 2000 is definitely not OSHA-approved.
Since the new mun I hit things in even a 4k orbit. Can we revive this and find the new highest point?

Since the new mun I hit things in even a 4k orbit. Can we revive this and find the new highest point?

Let's not, it's already been discussed in more recent threads.

That said, locking this.
